alert.note: Alert for Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Payette, southwestern Washington and northeastern Malheur Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 332 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weiser, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Weiser and Annex around 340 PM MDT. Payette, Presley Bridge and Bear Creek Summit around 410 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
